headline: Piper Sandler Assigns Overweight Rating on KKR, Maintains $166 PT
summary: KKR & Co. Inc. (NYSE:KKR) is one of the best dividend stocks to buy. On September 9, following a group meeting with KKR’s CFO Rob Lewin and institutional investors, Piper Sandler reaffirmed its Overweight rating on the stock and assigned a price target of $166. The firm showed confidence in KKR, noting stronger transaction volumes […]
